The term RADICAL comes from Latin ("root"), meaning "root" or "base", referring above all to a deep, substantial point of view, even more so if applied to some CONVICTION, PRACTICE, ANALYSIS THE PROPOSAL.
An agency that seeks to propose, strong, convincing, practical, innovative, creative designs, that manage to position themselves in the market.
